headline: Dividend Hike Amid Softer 2026 Outlook Could Be A Game Changer For Northrop Grumman (NOC)
summary: In early February 2026, Northrop Grumman’s board declared a quarterly dividend of US$2.31 per share, payable on March 11, 2026, to shareholders of record as of February 23, 2026. This announcement followed quarterly results where the company beat earnings expectations but issued softer sales and earnings guidance for 2026 despite a record US$95.70 billion backlog. Next, we’ll examine how Northrop’s earnings beat but softer 2026 guidance may affect its investment narrative and perceived...
